alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 12:43AM EST until March 12 at 2:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 215 AM EST/115 AM CST/. * At 1243 AM EST/1143 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 23 miles southwest of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Beverly, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bay City and Apalachicola Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST/500 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
